item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://ip.alstra.ca/ - Address Checker](https://ip.alstra.ca/) â€” A free and simple tool to check your exit IP address across multiple nodes and understand how your IP appears to different global regions and services. Useful for testing rule-based DNS splitting tools such as Control D.

item.title: Add LabEx to list of Education and Career Development
item.description: https://labex.io - Develop skills in Linux, DevOps, Cybersecurity, Programming, Data Science, and more through interactive labs and real-world projects.

item.title: Update the monthly time limit of Appetize's free plan
item.description: https://appetize.io - Test your Android & iOS apps on this Cloud Based Android Phone / Tablets emulator and iPhone/iPad simulators directly in your browser. The free tier includes two concurrent session with 30 minutes of usage per month. No limit on app size.

item.title: Add fontsensei
item.description: https://fontsensei.com/) Opensourced Google fonts tagged by users. With CJK (Chinese,Japanese,Korean - Google fonts tagged by users. With CJK (Chinese,Japanese,Korean) font tags.

item.description: https://uiland.design/ - - [Mobile screenshots] Explore Mobile and Web UI Designs from Leading Companies in Africa and the world.

item.title: Add LabEx Teams to list of collaboration tools
item.description: https://labex.io/teams - - A free platform for teams and schools to manage tech skill trees and track learning progress, available for up to 100 members.

item.title: SuperPM renamed to Crosswork
item.description: https://crosswork.app/ - Versatile project management platform. Free for up to 3 projects, unlimited users, 1 GB storage.

item.title: Add GetVM to IDE and Code Editing section
item.description: https://getvm.io - Instant free Linux and IDEs chrome sidebar. The free tier includes 5 VMs per day.

item.title: Add whats free
item.description: https://github.com/langfuse/langfuse - Open-source LLM engineering platform that helps teams collaboratively debug, analyze, and iterate on their LLM applications. Free forever plan includes 50k observations per month and all platform features. [#opensource](https://github.com/langfuse/langfuse)

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.treblle.com - Treblle helps teams build, ship, and govern APIs. With advanced API log aggregation, observability, docs, and debugging. You get all features for free, but there is a limit of up to 250k requests per month on the free tier.
